manipulators.description: Toggle on/off Layer 1 variable (In-built Apple keyboard)
y -> Shift–Command–Left Arrow: Select the text between the insertion point and the beginning of the current line
u -> Option–Shift–Left Arrow: Extend text selection to the beginning of the current word
i -> Shift–Left Arrow: Extend text selection one character to the left
o -> Shift–Right Arrow: Extend text selection one character to the right
p -> Option–Shift–Right Arrow: Extend text selection to the end of the current word
quote -> Shift–Command–Right Arrow: Select the text between the insertion point and the end of the current line
v -> go to beginning of line
b -> go to end of line
slash -> go to beginning of file(vscode)
n -> go to beginning of file(intellij)
n -> go to end of file(vscode)
n -> go to end of file(intellij)
m -> (cursorTopSelect) Select from cursor to beginning of the file (Vscode)
m -> Select from cursor to beginning of the file (intellij)
comma -> (cursorTopSelect) Select from cursor to end of the file (Vscode)
comma -> Select from cursor to end of the file (intellij)
h -> Delete the word to the left of the insertion point

rules.description: to: doublequote on first layer and shift + doublequote -> quote on 2nd layer
